import React, {useContext} from 'react'; import Navigation from '../components/Navigation'; import IsometricBlock from '../components/IsometricBlock'; import { DiJavascript, DiHtml5, DiCss3Full, DiReact, DiSass } from 'react-icons/di'; import { SiRedux, SiFirebase, SiPhp, SiSymfony, SiMysql, SiGithub, SiGimp, SiInkscape } from 'react-icons/si'; import LanguageContext from '../components/LanguageContext'; import SocialNetwork from '../components/SocialNetwork'; import ParametresBanner from '../components/ParametresBanner'; import BtnDestruc from '../components/BtnDestruc'; import {skillsDatas} from '../data/languages-data'; const Skills = () => { const language = useContext(LanguageContext); const toggleTabs = (e)=>{ if(e.target.parentNode.classList.contains('active')) return; document.querySelector('.tabs-container .active').classList.remove('active') document.querySelector('article.active').classList.remove('active'); document.querySelectorAll('article').forEach(article =>{ if(article.id === e.target.parentNode.classList[0]){ article.classList.add('active'); e.target.parentNode.classList.add('active') } }) } return (

{language.language === "Shakespeare" ? ".Skills" : ".Compétences"}

{language.language === "Shakespeare" ? skillsDatas.en.global : skillsDatas.fr.global}

  • toggleTabs(e)}>
  • toggleTabs(e)}>
  • toggleTabs(e)}>

{language.language === "Shakespeare" ? skillsDatas.en.front.title : skillsDatas.fr.front.title}

{language.language === "Shakespeare" ? skillsDatas.en.front.p : skillsDatas.fr.front.p}

{language.language === "Shakespeare" ? skillsDatas.en.back.title : skillsDatas.fr.back.title}

{language.language === "Shakespeare" ? skillsDatas.en.back.p : skillsDatas.fr.back.p}

{language.language === "Shakespeare" ? skillsDatas.en.title : skillsDatas.fr.title}

{language.language === "Shakespeare" ? skillsDatas.en.p : skillsDatas.fr.p}

); }; export default Skills;
